abstract: What to do after a mortgage rejection, Caribbean resorts battle seaweed, cellphone customers to get notice of excess use and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
snippet: What to do after a mortgage rejection, Caribbean resorts battle seaweed, cellphone customers to get notice of excess use and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: A variety of consumer-focused articles appears daily in The New York Times and online in our blogs. Each weekday morning, we gather them together here so you can quickly scan the news that could hit you in your wallet.

headline.main: Monday Reading: What To Do After A Mortgage Rejection
